DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of CSL112 in healthy volunteers after multiple infusions.
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study of CSL112 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy males and females aged 18 years to less than 55 years Body weight 50kg or greater Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 42.0 kg/m2 Evidence of a clinically significant medical condition, disorder or disease Evidence of hepatobiliary disease Any clinically relevant abnormal laboratory test result Evidence or history of alcohol or substance abuse
